data.text: Atĩrĩrĩ, inyuĩ ndũrĩrĩ, ũkai hakuhĩ mũthikĩrĩrie;
Andũ arĩa moragĩtwo magaateo o ro ũguo,
Rũhiũ rwakwa rwa njora rũnyuĩte rũkanyootoka rũrĩ o kũu matu-inĩ;
Rũhiũ rwa njora rwa Jehova rũiyũrĩtwo nĩ thakame,
Nĩgũkorwo Jehova arĩ na mũthenya wa kwĩrĩhĩria,
Tũrũũĩ twa Edomu tũkaagarũrwo tũtuĩke rami,
Naguo mwaki ũcio ndũkahorio mũthenya na ũtukũ;
Ndundu ya werũ-inĩ na ndundu ĩrĩa ĩgambaga nĩikegwatĩra kũndũ kũu;
Gũtigakorwo kĩndũ andũ akuo arĩa marĩ igweta mangĩĩta ũthamaki,
Mĩigua nĩĩkamerera nyũmba ciakuo cia ũthamaki iria njirigĩre,
Nyamũ cia werũ-inĩ nĩigacemania na hiti,
Ndundu nĩĩgaka gĩtara kũu, ĩrekagĩrie matumbĩ mayo kuo,
Atĩrĩrĩ, tuĩriai ũhoro ibuku-inĩ rĩa gĩkũnjo rĩa Jehova, na mũrĩthome:
